segments.text: I see the sunlit window overlooking a neat garden.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Inside, the woman's absorbed in her routine chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink overflow is ruining the moment, water everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, and it breaks my heart a little.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor's a mess now, slippery and dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy climbing the stool adds to the worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching so high, the stool wobbling under him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One slip and he'll fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks on hopefully for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Their innocence in the face of risk is touching yet tragic.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar tempts them, full and open.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel for the woman; she'll be devastated when she sees this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peaceful outside world mocks the turmoil within.
segments.speaker: PAR
